items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for seamless API management. Apic simplifies API calls by providing automatic retries, intelligent caching, and robust error handling, so you can focus on building your application without worrying about the complexities of API interactions.

items.content_html: A feature-rich clone of RAWG.io built using modern web technologies like Vite, React, TypeScript, and Chakra UI. This project serves as a lightweight, responsive video game discovery platform where users can browse, search, and view detailed information about various games.
